discussion.p: In Berlin, as a working group, we voted in favor of N1932 which makes issue 507 moot: variate_generator has been eliminated. Then in full committee we voted to give this issue WP status (mistakenly).

resolution.p: Strike the proposed resolution of issue 507.
resolution.note: post-Portland: Walter and Howard recommend NAD. The proposed resolution of 507 no longer exists in the current WD.

rationale.p: NAD. Will be moot once N2135 is adopted.
